about.title: About Us
about.story: Art Wood Design has been creating handcrafted wooden art since 2006. Our master craftsman combines traditional carving techniques with modern design principles to produce durable, artistic, and customized wooden products. We use eco-friendly materials and local wood, maintaining the harmony between nature and craftsmanship.
